content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am harrassed by some bullshits online.
It sounds like you have been getting attacked online for a while, which is understandable. I have had some bad experiences in the past when I was being bullied. Would you like to talk about it?
Someone is trying to keep an eye on my personal life.
I see. It sounds like you are concerned about how these things are affecting you and that this could be stopping you from doing any activities that you enjoy. Is this true?
